name: LD48 - Into the abyss (PostLD Version)
description:
Explore the depth, to find the legendary wreck of the Capsule ship of the no less legendary captain P. Holder (he never liked jokes about his name). But beware evil subs abound, don’t get caught or face defeat.

Source code for both versions : https://github.com/squirrelsoftcompany/LD48
